title: Department of Homeland Security publishes space policy
summary: The Department of Homeland Security (DHS) has published an updated space policy that emphasizes its roles in cybersecurity and resilience.

title: Richard Branson won the space tourism battle, but his company lost the war
summary: "Blue Origin already won the suborbital space tourism race on July 20, 2021."

title: SpaceX’s 50th dedicated Starlink mission begins filling new network layer
summary: SpaceX launched the 50th dedicated mission for the Starlink internet network Sunday from California’s Central Coast, deploying 46 broadband relay nodes to begin populating a new polar-orbiting “shell” to fill in gaps in the satellite constellation.

title: Astronomers eagerly await first images from the James Webb Space Telescope
summary: After six months of tests and checkout, NASA’s James Webb Space Telescope is finally ready to open a new window on the universe, capturing the faint light of the first stars and galaxies, probing the mysteries of black holes and studying the atmospheres of alien worlds.

title: SpaceX launches first mission to third shell of Starlink constellation
summary: Continuing its busy 2022 launch manifest, SpaceX has begun filling the next shell of the Starlink constellation. The Starlink 3-1 mission lifted off aboard a Falcon 9 rocket from Vandenberg Space Force Base at 6:39 PM PDT Sunday (01:39 UTC on Monday), tasked with delivering 46 Starlink satellites to low Earth orbit.
